app_metadata.title: Garage

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Garage

attrs.label: Admin Token
attrs.description: The token used to authenticate as an admin user.

schema.valid_chars_error:
RPC Secret must be a hexadecimal string.</br>
Allowed characters are [a-f] and [0-9].

attrs.label: Additional Options
attrs.description:
Set any option to the configuration file.</br>
The path to the option must be in the format of `.section.subsection.option`.</br>
For example, to set the `root_domain` option in the `.s3_api` section, use `.s3_api.root_domain` as the path.</br>
See available options here https://garagehq.deuxfleurs.fr/documentation/reference-manual/configuration.</br>
You can also edit the configuration file directly in the container at `/var/lib/garage/config/garage.toml`.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description: The type of the option.

enum.description: String
Integer
Boolean

attrs.label: Path
attrs.description: The path to the option in the configuration file.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Path must start with a dot (.) and contain at least one character.</br>
Example: `.s3_api.root_domain`.</br>
See available options here https://garagehq.deuxfleurs.fr/documentation/reference-manual/configuration.

attrs.label: Value
attrs.description: The value of the option.

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that Garage files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that Garage files will be owned by.

attrs.label: WebUI Port
attrs.description:
This port is used to access a third part Garage WebUI.</br>
Set it to "None" to stop the WebUI from being started.

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access
Expose port for inter-container communication
None

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port
